general.about_us_text: We are your partner in a changing and digitalized business world and we will help you take advantage of the opportunities of the future of work with our consulting, training and recruitment.
general.about_us_text_1:
We are the subsidiary of ZAidAN specialized in consulting, training and recruitment, with operations in Morocco.



As part of the ZAidAN global network, we provide comprehensive services for the business development and sustainable growth of organizations in a variety of sectors.

We firmly believe that the true value of a company lies in the support, tools and opportunities of growth that you offer to your team, which is why we are committed to providing the necessary support to turn businesses into excellent companies.
general.text_1: We analyze and optimize the strategic HR areas to enhance the transformation of your organization
general.text_2:
We adapt: We adapt our consulting to the needs and particularities of your company.

Focus on achievements: Our action plans are aimed at helping you meet your goals. goals, accompanying you throughout the process.

Global Reach: We are available both nationally and internationally, with a wide coverage network.
general.text_4: Greater efficiency and effectiveness in your processes
general.text_6: Expansion of reach at a national and international level
general.text_7: Significant improvement in business performance and team well-being
general.text_8: We specialize in attracting and identifying the most qualified talent so that you can strengthen your organization with the best professionals.
general.text_13: We carefully select professionals who fit perfectly with your company.
general.text_14: We offer a rigorous, transparent and precise selection process, supported by a unique methodology.
general.text_15: We have highly specialized consultants in selection, dedicated to identifying and evaluating the talent you need.
general.text_16: We analyze your objectives and design a tailored selection process, focused on the profile you are looking for.
general.text_18:
1. • We select and attract the talent most compatible with your company.

  2. • Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) if what you are looking for is to delegate complete or partial management of your recruitment area.< /li>
general.text_20:
1. • We provide you with assistance if you have attracted talent and need to evaluate it. Candidates can be external, internal or a combination of both.

  2. • We carry out evaluation sessions, tests and interviews to analyze the profiles.

  3. • You will be able to minimize errors in hiring or internal promotion decisions with our evaluation process services.
general.text_22:
1. • Our situational assessment techniques will allow us to identify critical behaviors for effective staff performance.

  2. • Access our services for external selection processes, such as for internal promotion and development plans.
